# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="89d9d-102">Čuvanje poruka u Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="89d9d-103">Ne možete da sačuvate e-poruke u Outlook.com, ali možete da ih odštampate u PDF formatu koji možete da sačuvate na RAČUNARU.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="89d9d-104">Uslužni program Microsoft PRINT u PDF koji je uključen u Windows 10 omogućava vam da odštampate sve e-poruke direktno u PDF formatu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="89d9d-105">Izaberite poruku koju želite da sačuvate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="89d9d-106">Izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="89d9d-107">na vrhu poruke, a zatim izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="89d9d-108">**Štampanje**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="89d9d-109">Ponovo kliknite na dugme " **Odštampaj** ", a zatim iz padajućeg menija štampača izaberite **Microsoft Štampaj u PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="89d9d-110">Izaberite stavku **Odštampaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="89d9d-111">Unesite ime datoteke, a zatim kliknite na dugme **Sačuvaj**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="89d9d-112">**Napomena:** Ovo se ne preporučuje na deljenim ili javnim računarima, jer drugi korisnici mogu da imaju pristup svim PDFs koje čuvate na RAČUNARU i ne brišete.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="89d9d-113">Više informacija o štampanju potražite u članku [Štampanje e-poruka, priloga i kalendara u programu Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="89d9d-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
